items.name: Blue Cane Vase
items.description: This is a vase made with a base of white covered with swirls of blue cane. It was made by a member of the Gaffer's Guild.

items.name: Blue Spiral Vase
items.description: The blue in this vase was twisted creating a spiral. It was made by a member of the Gaffer's Guild.

items.name: Cyclone Vase
items.description: This is a cyclone themed straight vase blown by a member of the Gaffer's Guild.

items.name: Green Speckled Vase
items.description: This is a vase made by overlaying different green frit. It was blown by a member of the Gaffer's Guild.

items.name: Red Drop Vase
items.description: This is a red drop vase made by a member of the Gaffer's Guild.

items.name: Red Fluted Vase
items.description: This fluted red vase blown by a Gaffer's Guild member.
